sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { convertToMoney } from '../../utils';
import { Name, CoinSlider, CoinDisplayDiv, Image, Rank, Hour, Price, Day, Week, VolumeMarket, CirculatingSupply, Last7d, ImgName, Volume, Market, Circulating, Supply } from './styles';
import millify from 'millify';
import SparklineChart from './chart';


export default function CoinTableData(props) {
    const {market_cap_rank, image, name, current_price, hourchange, daychange, total_volume, market_cap, circulating_supply, total_supply, sparkline_in_7d} = props;
    return(
        <CoinDisplayDiv>
            <Rank>{props.market_cap_rank}</Rank>
            <ImgName>
                <Image src={props.image}></Image>
                <Name>{props.name}</Name>        
            </ImgName>
            <Price>{convertToMoney.format(props.current_price)}</Price>
            <Hour isPositive={(props.hourchange > 0)}>{props.hourchange.toFixed(2)}</Hour>
            <Day isPositive={(props.daychange > 0)}>{props.daychange.toFixed(2)}</Day>
            <Week>{props.weekchange.toFixed(2)}</Week>
            <VolumeMarket>
                <Volume>{millify(props.total_volume)}</Volume>
                <Market>{millify(props.market_cap)}</Market>
                <CoinSlider type="range" min="0" max="100" value={(props.total_volume/props.market_cap)*100}/>
            </VolumeMarket>
            <CirculatingSupply>
                <Circulating>{millify(props.circulating_supply)}</Circulating>
                <Supply>{(props.total_supply) ? millify(props.total_supply) : "∞"}</Supply>
                <CoinSlider type="range" min="0" max="100" value={(props.circulating_supply/props.total_supply)*100}/>
            </CirculatingSupply>
            <Last7d>
                <SparklineChart labels={props.sparkline_in_7d.price} data={props.sparkline_in_7d.price}/>
            </Last7d>
        </CoinDisplayDiv>
    )
}
